channel.description: Recent content in test on zhi.moe

item.title: 单元测试如何Mock有参数的void方法
item.description: 假设有如下的服务依赖： @Service class DepositSvc { @Autowired private AccountSvc accSvc; public List<Account> dps(String user) { List<Account> accounts = new ArrayList(); List<Account> banks = getBanks(); accSvc.addLinkedAccounts(user, accounts, banks);//accounts被改动了如何mock? return accounts; } } @Service class AccountSvc { @Autowired private RestClient restClient; public void addLinkedAccounts(String user, List<Account> accounts, List<Account> banks) { acc = restClient.getAcc(user); accounts.add(acc); } } 这里的AccountSvc只是提供了一个void方法处理了入
